title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button is not aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label. Multiple selection is not allowed. The signature preview is not a label and doesn't wrap. The signature preview does not have the same background color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and list should be smaller. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
